string.text:
This guide details basic survival skills and provides an overview of common survival kits. The later chapters describe the creation of basic gear out of common materials.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] informative
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] craft recipe

Manual of mechanical engineering. Useful for learning more about the facilities and factories within the Zone. Contains details about basic mechanical and electrical equipment.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] informative
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] craft recipe

Manual of industrial engineering. Describes the operation of modern electronics: operational amplifiers, semiconductor diodes, bipolar junction transistors, and field effect transistors. The second part of this manual deals with troubleshooting electrical devices.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] informative
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] craft recipe

A couple of pages torn from a book, handwritten in smudged blue. The written notes describe the creation of various types of drugs and medicines using common medical supplies.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] informative
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] craft recipe

Every stalker should learn to use a gun, but also how to choose the right ammunition. This guide provides information on various types of ammunition and weapons.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] informative
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] craft recipe

A couple of handwritten pages containing detailed recipes and information on cooking mutant meats.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] informative
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] cooking recipe

An old, faded notebook slipped into a card sleeve to protect it from wear and tear. Unfortunately, it didn't withstand the passage of time and only a small part is legible.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:

An old, faded notebook slipped into a card sleeve to protect it from wear and tear. Unfortunately, it didn't withstand the passage of time and only a small part is legible.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:

An instructional leaflet with a large Freedom emblem stamped into the upper right corner.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:

An instructional leaflet with a large Freedom emblem stamped into the upper right corner.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
A couple of pages torn from a memoir. Author unknown.\n \n
A couple of pages torn from a memoir. Author unknown.\n \n
Walking Dead Findings Field Report 39B rev. 2 (Part 1 of 3)

A machine-typed document stamped with the Ecologist research emblem. Classified as strictly confidential and signed by: %c[ui_gray_1]Arkady Cvetkovsky.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
Walking Dead Findings Field Report 39B rev. 2 (Part 2 of 3)

A machine-typed document stamped with the Ecologist research emblem. Classified as strictly confidential and signed by: %c[ui_gray_1]Arkady Cvetkovsky.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
Walking Dead Findings Field Report 39B rev. 2 (part 3 of 3)

A machine-typed document stamped with the Ecologist research emblem. Classified as strictly confidential and signed by: %c[ui_gray_1]Arkady Cvetkovsky.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:

An untitled document comprised of a few paragraphs with frequent references to the Monolith.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:

An untitled document comprised of a few paragraphs with frequent references to the Monolith.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:

An untitled document comprised of a few paragraphs with frequent references to the Monolith.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:

An untidy and chaotically hand-written note.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:

A letter written to someone outside the Zone, most probably their lover. It looks to have unfortunately never reached its intended recipient.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:

A note found in a stash. Looks like someone was killing time during a long and boring night.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:

A handwritten note from one of the Mercenaries containing thoughts concerning his activities in the Zone.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:

A printed transcription of a radio transmission between military units stationed in the Zone. Most probably apart of some clandestine operation.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:

A hand-written letter addressed to Nikolai.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
